name: The Warmonger
description:
Sometimes, wars are more lucrative than you think.

The Warmonger is a turn-based strategy game developed by the team Warmongers for Homemade Jam (#homemade-jam) hosted by Istanbul Technical University Game Design and Development Club. The game jam's theme was "Equilibrium (Denge in Turkish)"

Players as a human war merchant tries to make the war between orcs, dwarves and elves last in equilibrium as long as possible to gain as much riches as possible from their suffering. However, there are a lot of things to consider that will topple the equilibrium like the traits of the races, and how their trades will effect the scales. Their work will not be easy!

--- Controls ---

Players only need their mouse to play this game.
